_header: Father our that art in heaven bliss
_description: Pater noster — twelve lines in couplets

BLAru292.First Lines:
Fader ure ðatt art in heuene blisseÐin hege name itt
                    [wyn]urðe bliscedd …
BLAru292.Last Lines:
…Leet us noct in fondinge falleOoc fro iuel ðu sild us
                    alle amen
